Subject: Re: Galva-talk
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"You dare turn youre back on me" he screamed. But composed himself. This
was not the same Galvatron from the great war, this one was calculating,
closer to himself. He also knew Galvatron was Partially right, He might
have been able to defeat them, but not this weak, he slowly lifted up, and
flew towards the Destron base. He had never been there, but Galvatron had,
so he knew where it is.
